title: vote.cast@1.0.0
description: Payload for casting a vote with optional weighting metadata.

proposalId.description: Identifier for the proposal or ballot.

choice.description: Voter choice. Supports enums, ranked ballots, or numeric weights.

weight.description: Vote weight encoded as a string to preserve large values.

ballotId.description: Optional unique identifier of this ballot submission.

metadata.description: Additional vote metadata (e.g., delegation chain, quorum proofs).
